title: Unintentional comedy?
review: I laughed through the entire movie. It is so bad. The only way to describe it is Hot Potato, the horror movie.

title: They should have called it the curse of the plastic women
review: Somebody made a comedy and try to pass it off as a horror flick what was up with all the plastic surgery done on these women?

title: Wow...
review:
It's like a bad porno but without the fun part. The acing is horrible, the cinematography is done by amateurs and is very bad, the whole movie sucks.

It's clear that all the 10 rating comes from friends and families of the movie maker.
